text: and rubber gloves, uh, air freshener. um, noise-cancelling headphones. oh, danger whistle. um, pepper spray. ooh, a multi-language occupied sign. uh, let's see, we have seat protectors, uh, booties for my shoes, a clothespin for my nose. oh, and a mirror on a stick, so i can make sure the person in the stall next to me isn't some kind of weirdo.
